sentences.sContent: the chairman of the Congressional Black Caucus
sentences.sCn: 国会黑人议员同盟的主席

remMethod.val: 源自Caucus， 波士顿政党会议俱乐部 (18世纪60年代)

trans.tranCn: 领导人秘密会议； 核心小组会议
trans.tranOther: a meeting of the members of a political party to choose people to represent them in a larger meeting, election etc
